scripts.start: watchify src/index.js -o static/bundle.js -dv -p livereactload  -x react -x react-dom -x ksana-codemirror -x codemirror
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ]  -x ksana-codemirror -x codemirror  -x react -x react-dom  | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -c=dead_code,evaluate,loops,unused -m > static/bundle.js
